hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT MIN(r.startTime) AS min FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Pollutant poll on o.pollutantId=poll.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :procedure

SELECT MAX(r.endTime) AS max FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Pollutant poll on o.pollutantId=poll.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :procedure

SELECT DISTINCT pro.inspireId as [procedure] FROM AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on o.processId=pro.id inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on o.samplingPointId=sp.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sp.stationId=sta.id WHERE sta.inspireId = :feature

SELECT pro.inspireId, poll.URI, sta.inspireId, MIN(r.startTime) as min , MAX(r.endTime) as max FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Pollutant poll on o.pollutantId=poll.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on o.samplingPointId=sp.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sp.stationId=sta.Id WHERE pro.inspireId IN (:procedures) GROUP BY pro.inspireId, poll.URI, sta.inspireId

SELECT pro.inspireId as [procedure], MIN(r.startTime) as minPhenStart, MAX(r.startTime) as maxPhenStart, MAX(r.endTime) as maxPhenEnd FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Pollutant poll on o.pollutantId=poll.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on o.samplingPointId=sp.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sp.stationId=sta.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :procedure GROUP BY pro.inspireId

SELECT DISTINCT r.unit as unit FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId = o.id inner join AQD.dbo.Pollutant phen on o.pollutantId=phen.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE phen.URI = :observableProperty AND pro.inspireId = :procedure
